row.entry: This module allows you to change the local contrast of your image.

sect3.title: Usage
sect3.para: Local contrast is used to enhance your image by giving it more energy.

sect4.title: alpha
sect4.para: Alpha is the inverse of a radius. It reprensents the sensitivity of edge detection.

sect4.title: scale
sect4.para: Set the desired scale. Spatial extent of the effect around edges.

sect4.title: strength
sect4.para: Set the strength of the effect.
